title: Sennheiser to Spotlight Innovative Unified Communications Headsets and Speakerphones at BroadSoft Connections 2015 in Phoenix, AZ
text:
Sennheiser to Spotlight Innovative Unified Communications Headsets and Speakerphones at BroadSoft Connections 2015 in Phoenix, AZ September 29, 2015 -- Old Lyme, Conn. (PRWEB) September 29, 2015 Sennheiser , a leading manufacturer of premium headset and audio solutions, announces it will showcase its award-winning headset and speakerphone solutions at BroadSoft Connections 2015, taking place at the Arizona Biltmore resort in Phoenix, AZ, from October 25 28. BroadSoft is the leading provider of software and services that enable mobile, fixed-line and cable service providers to deliver unified communications over their IP networks. Sennheiser will be located at booth #50 at the show, showing a roster of products from its CC&O (contact center and office) segment. The Sennheiser booth will spotlight a versatile line of unified communications audio solu-tions, including the D 10 series, SD wireless, Century, Circle, Culture, MB and PRESENCE headsets. The company will also exhibit its portable SP 10 and SP 20 speakerphones, ideal for SMB and highly configurable mobile environments. Sennheisers solutions are certified for Microsofts Skype for Business and compatible with all BroadSofts UC and telephony solutions. These award-winning headsets ensure superior fidelity for that all-important connection between the end-user company and its customers and business partners. The portfolio features premium noise cancellation, exceptional voice intelligibility, comfort over long periods of use, and durability that enhances the valueand the productivity-boosting capabilitiesof advanced telephony technologies. It leverages seven decades of Sennheisers top-flight audio engineering expertise, with roots in the professional recording and consumer electronics sectors, as the company celebrates its 70th anniversary this year. Sennheiser shares our commitment to bringing innovative solutions to market that enable individuals and teams to create, collaborate and be productive in ways never before imagined, said Taher Behbehani, chief marketing officer, BroadSoft. We are excited that Sennheiser has chosen to make this announcement at Connections, and to join us as we collectively define the future of work. Were thrilled to expand our trade show schedule by participating in BroadSoft Connections, a key venue for operators who are looking to profit from the delivery of state-of-the-art unified communications systems, said Bill Whearty, vice president, sales and marketing, CC&O, Americas, Sennheiser Electronic Corp. Its our goal to stress the urgency of superior voice intelligibility as a requirement in these environments, and also as a compelling sales tool, one which helps maintain the integrity of a truly sophisticated UC network. We look forward to introducing our solutions to BroadSofts customer community. Caption: Sennheisers D 10 USB is a streamlined single-sided wireless DECT headset that connects directly to the softphone/PC. About Sennheiser Audio specialist Sennheiser is one of the world's leading manufacturers of headphones, microphones and wireless transmission systems. Based in Wedemark near Hanover, Germany, Sennheiser operates its own production facilities in Germany, Ireland and the USA and is active in more than 50 countries. With 18 sales subsidiaries and long-established trading partners, the company supplies innovative products and cutting-edge audio solutions that are optimally tailored to its customers' needs. Sennheiser is a family owned company that was founded in 1945 and which today has 2,700 employees around the world that share a passion for audio technology. Since 2013, Sennheiser has been managed by Daniel Sennheiser and Dr. Andreas Sennheiser, the third generation of the family to run the company. As part of the Sennheiser Group, the joint venture Sennheiser Communications A/S is specialized in wireless and wired headsets and speakerphones for contact centers, offices and Unified Communications environments as well as headsets for gaming and mobile devices. In 2014, the Sennheiser Group had sales totalling 635 million. http://www.sennheiser.com About BroadSoft: BroadSoft is the leading provider of software and services that enable mobile, fixed-line and cable service providers to offer unified communications over their Internet Protocol networks. The companys core communications platform enables the delivery of a range of enterprise and consumer calling, messaging and collaboration communication services, including private branch exchanges, video calling, text messaging and converged mobile and fixed-line services. For additional information, visit http://www.BroadSoft.com .
